original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 290.50/291.50 to US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bonds opened steady on Tuesday, dealers said while the Spot US dollar opened at 290.50/291.50 rupees, dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 290.50/291.00 rupees rupees on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 24.40/60 percent steady from 24.65/70 percent a day earlier, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 25.25/75 percent steady from 25.30/26.25 percent a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted at 20.15/25 percent, down from 26.30/27.30 percent at last close.
